SummaryEnglish: A weekly animanga podcast hosted by Scarra and PeterParkTV! New episodes release on Wednesdays.

1.TitleEnglish: Nobody Asked, We Delivered | Fake Fans #1
1.SummaryEnglish: Welcome to the first ever episode of the Fake Fans Podcast with @scarra and @peterparkTV! Hope you're ready for a wild ride ????

2.TitleEnglish: How Wrong Is MyAnimeList Top 10? | Fake Fans #2
2.SummaryEnglish: Scar and Pete give their hot takes on the MyAnimeList Top 10 anime list. Are they right? Are they wrong? Find out in the new episode of Fake Fans Podcast!

3.TitleEnglish: Has Fanservice Gone Too Far? | Fake Fans #3
3.SummaryEnglish: This week on the Fake Fans Podcast, Scarra, Peter, and Sydeon discuss reading manga vs comics, new vs old anime, fan service, and more. Thank you to Syd for joining this episode and for being the first ever guest on the Fake Fans Podcast! We hope to have you back again soon ????

4.SummaryEnglish: Our longest episode yet of the Fake Fans Podcast features Peter & Scarra reviewing the Spring 2024 Anicharts, sharing their recent manga reads (our last episode was filmed a while ago!), and covering the manhwa sphere.

5.TitleEnglish: The Five Figure Gacha King | Fake Fans #5
5.SummaryEnglish: This week's episode of the Fake Fans Podcast dives into the world of gacha games, trashy manga, and canceled anime series. ALSO SCARRA AND PETER ARE READING ONE PIECE AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!! ⚠️????⚠️????⚠️????⚠️????⚠️????⚠️????

6.TitleEnglish: Crash Landing With LilyPichu | Fake Fans #6
6.SummaryEnglish: Wednesday means new Fake Fans! This week, LilyPichu, Scarra, and Peter get their feet censored while they talk about their favorite anime, Kdramas, fighting games, and lots of other fun topics. Thank you Lily for being a great guest and we look forward to following your blossoming Tekken 8 career ????

7.SummaryEnglish: A brand new, thrilling episode of the Fake Fans Podcast just dropped! Scarra and Peter catch up with each other, talk about sports anime, food in anime, and launch the first Fake Fans Manga Club.

8.TitleEnglish: Growing Up With Manga | Fake Fans #8
8.SummaryEnglish: Enjoy this new Fake Fans Podcast episode which features Scarra, Peter, and special guest Brodin Plett discussing manga, anime, and video games that they grew up with, anime vs live action adaptations, and more! Thank you Brodin for joining :)

9.TitleEnglish: We Started A Manga Club | Fake Fans #9
9.SummaryEnglish: Hello everyone! This week's Fake Fans episode includes some life updates from Scarra & Peter, an update on the manga (book) club, opinions on mecha, and more.

10.TitleEnglish: Getting Bullied For Liking Anime | Fake Fans #10
10.SummaryEnglish: This episode is like a weeb confessional booth where special guest @DisguisedToast is the priest, and Scarra and Peter are the penitents. Enjoy!

11.TitleEnglish: Weekly Shonen Jump Rankings | Fake Fans #11
11.SummaryEnglish: It's a new podcast episode! Listen in as Scarra and Peter talk about high school, their manga club thoughts, Weekly Shonen Jump, and more :)

12.TitleEnglish: What Is Spoiler Etiquette? | Fake Fans #12
12.SummaryEnglish: We are humbled to have anime expert ‪@yvonnie‬ on the Fake Fans Podcast for this week's episode - Tune in to hear our cast of three discuss their favorite classic anime, time skips, anime crushes, and more.

13.SummaryEnglish: This new episode of the Fake Fans Podcast includes stories about OffKai, Scarra's recent travel to Asia, Peter's continued gacha addiction and more.

14.TitleEnglish: It Takes 10,000 Hours To Become A Master | Fake Fans #14
14.SummaryEnglish: HAPPY FOURTH OF JULY TO OUR FELLOW AMERICANS, and apologies for the delay on this episode release. Hope you enjoy an extra long episode of Fake Fans with our special guest ‪@Seanic‬ and his crazy takes.

15.TitleEnglish: Anime Expo Horror Stories | Fake Fans #15
15.SummaryEnglish: Scarra and Peter made it back alive from Anime Expo to bring YOU the freshest and newest episode of the Fake Fans Podcast.

16.TitleEnglish: Evo 2024 Was The Best Convention Ever | Fake Fans #16
16.SummaryEnglish: Scarra & Peter just returned from Evo to bring you a new episode of the Fake Fans Podcast!

17.TitleEnglish: Life As A Professional Cosplayer ft. Lena Lemon | Fake Fans #17
17.SummaryEnglish: Join us for a fun-filled episode of the Fake Fans Podcast with special guest ‪@LenaLemon‬ as we dive into topics like comparing characters from Honkai and Genshin Impact, anime room decor, and the charm of cosplay at conventions.

18.SummaryEnglish: In this episode of Fake Fans, Scarra & Peter discusses Chicago's food scene, One Piece animation, and My Hero Academia's plot. They also discuss Arcane Season 2 leaks and the struggle of avoiding spoilers in the digital age.

19.TitleEnglish: The Girlfriend Episode ft. Anita | Fake Fans #19
19.SummaryEnglish: We finally get to meet Peter's girlfriend, Anita, in this new episode of Fake Fans!

20.TitleEnglish: The 2024 Olympics Was Epic | Fake Fans #20
20.SummaryEnglish: This episode of Fake Fans includes life updates from Scarra & Peter, their recent reads, and recent topics like the Olympics!

21.TitleEnglish: The Truth About Shonen Jump's New Series | Fake Fans #21
21.SummaryEnglish: We're in the middle of moving so we filmed a couch podcast episode at Peter's place :) This episode jumps across many topics including movies vs TV, video games, and Shonen Jump titles.
